backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining admin access logic, data stores for users and artifacts, and type definitions for artifact search and metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping numerous frontend source files to brief descriptions of their functionality.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation explaining frontend-visible auth, role model, first-admin bootstrap flow, and React Query–based data persistence.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design guidelines detailing the application's dark fantasy theme, colors, typography, layout, and interaction styles.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Documentation of local storage categories, offline drafts, mutation queue behavior, and React Query invalidation strategy.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists phase‑1 skeleton features and future enhancements for each site page including homepage, shop, dashboard, admin, and more.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines overall project architecture, sitemap, navigation, access levels, and phase‑1 scope for the application.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides manual QA test cases covering authentication, access control, and core user flows across devices and browsers.
Describes the iteration workflow, offline‑first feedback system, admin review flow, and update checklist for feature development.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Explains how to deploy the frontend and backend to production on IC or static hosts, including commands and environment variables.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes used throughout the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, root container, and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app with TanStack Router routes and React Query, loading many pages lazily.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team showcase with flip cards displaying member bios and expertise.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays chronological company milestones using styled cards and a vertical timeline.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Shows a placeholder card indicating admin access code settings are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Wraps and displays the analytics snapshot section for the admin panel.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCoupo: Implements full coupon management including creation, toggling, sending, and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Displays a placeholder indicating feedback management is pending backend support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Allows admins to send messages to customers and view inbox items with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Shows a placeholder for order management features not yet implemented.
Modal placeholder for order tracking management, awaiting backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPermi: Checks caller permissions and displays children or an access‑denied alert depending on permission state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Placeholder product admin tab showing a notice that backend features are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReque: Modal for viewing request details, currently showing a backend‑not‑implemented message.
Displays a placeholder requests management section pending backend support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSyste: Full system settings panel fetching various system logs, health data, and owner state with refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Placeholder testimonies management tab awaiting backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Placeholder user management tab pending backend support.
frontend/src/components/admin/BackupReco: Backup and recovery UI allowing backup creation, restoration, metadata viewing, and refresh operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessageAtt: Handles file selection, size validation, upload progress, and attachment management for messages.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/A: Layout shell containing top bar, sidebar, and main content area with mobile sidebar state handling.
Admin dashboard sidebar with navigation items, mobile behavior, and logout handling.
Top bar with mobile toggle, quick-create menu, notifications badge, and profile button.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/v: Admin view for managing lore and knowledge content with static info and a link to the public page.
Dashboard home showing basic stats, pending testimonies, and quick navigation actions.
UI for uploading large portfolio files with title and description, pending backend integration.
Placeholder security settings view noting required backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminP: Placeholder section for admin password reset awaiting backend support.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminR: Placeholder admin registry section pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Advanc: Placeholder for advanced shop controls requiring backend functionality.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Analyt: Placeholder analytics snapshot section with no backend yet.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Coupon: Placeholder coupon manager section awaiting backend support.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Portfo: Empty placeholder file for future portfolio manager section.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/QuoteR: Empty placeholder file for future quote request manager section.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Testim: Empty placeholder file for future testimony manager section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling authentication, session clearing, and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving user name and email during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin routes by checking identity and user role, showing loading, login prompt, or access denied screens before rendering children.
Validates a session-based admin access code and backend admin status, redirecting to the admin-access page when checks fail.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Blocks access until the user logs in with Internet Identity, showing a loading or login prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Restricts content to owner-level users by checking identity and ownership, displaying login or access-denied screens when necessary.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Renders a styled accordion list of frequently asked questions about artifacts and services.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Empty placeholder file for a future guild orders dashboard panel.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Empty placeholder file for a future inventory dashboard panel.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Displays detailed order tracking information including status, notes, location updates, and next steps in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Applies a fade‑in animation when the section enters the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component toggling front/back content with click or keyboard input, supporting reduced‑motion mode.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Provides a parallax scrolling layer using requestAnimationFrame and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Empty placeholder file for a feedback dialog component.
Empty placeholder file for a feedback launcher component.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Shows a list of announcement cards with dates, badges, and descriptions for recent updates.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Carousel component cycling through featured items with navigation buttons and detail links.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Grid of quick navigation cards linking to main site sections with icons.
frontend/src/components/intro/AboutIntro: Intro section with title and description for the About page wrapped in a styled border.
frontend/src/components/intro/AdminAcces: Simple intro block for the Admin Access page using a MysticalBorder wrapper.
frontend/src/components/intro/ContactInt: Contact page intro with header and descriptive text inside a styled border.
frontend/src/components/intro/FAQIntro.t: Intro component presenting the FAQ page title and summary.
frontend/src/components/intro/LoreKnowle: Intro section for the Lore and Knowledge page with themed description.
frontend/src/components/intro/PortfolioI: Portfolio page intro displaying a title and short description.
frontend/src/components/intro/ServicesIn: Services page intro outlining available expert services.
Shop page intro inviting users to browse the collection.
frontend/src/components/intro/SubmitRequ: Intro block for submitting custom project requests.
frontend/src/components/intro/Testimonie: Intro for the customer testimonies page with brief description.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with background, header, footer, quotes, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with site description, navigation links, legal links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with links, cart indicator, identity checks, and admin access logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Generic page wrapper providing optional title and description sections.
frontend/src/components/MysticalBorder.t: Provides a decorative container with animated glints and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Empty file placeholder for a portfolio details modal component.
Empty file placeholder for a portfolio widget section component.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Displays 2–3 random quotes on each page using a card layout.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Handles file selection, validation, preview creation, and upload progress tracking for images and videos in requests.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders an accordion listing service offerings with icons, summaries, details, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Displays a modal with full product details, pricing, availability, and add‑to‑cart controls.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Shows a flippable product card with image, price, availability, and a back side containing details and a view button.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Placeholder shopping cart drawer displaying a notice that backend functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Provides search, stock filtering, and sorting logic for product lists using React state and memoization.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks initial and subsequent page views by subscribing to router navigation events.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: A top-level error boundary that logs errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and troubleshooting options.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Displays a styled error message with offline detection and an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Displays and manages a local error log with options to view details and clear entries.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Shows a simple dialog indicating that testimony submission is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Half: Provides an interactive star rating input supporting half-star precision with hover and click handling.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Renders a read‑only star rating display with support for half stars.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Empty component file with no implementation.
Shows an image or autoplaying video that flips to reveal a text description.
Handles selecting, validating, previewing, and uploading photo/video media items for testimonies.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/useH: Custom hook that plays or pauses a video when hovered, depending on flip state.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a list of predefined quotes used across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCoupons.ts: Provides admin coupon CRUD hooks with placeholder backend calls and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMessaging.ts: Supplies hooks for fetching the admin inbox and sending admin messages using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminNotifications: Fetches admin notification counts from the backend with safe fallbacks on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRecovery.ts: Provides hooks to get backup metadata and trigger create or restore backup actions, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global listeners for runtime errors and unhandled promise rejections and logs sanitized error data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver-based hook to track when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a localStorage-backed shopping cart with add, remove, update, clear, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Stores, loads, and expires form drafts in localStorage for offline persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Empty placeholder file for future offline mutation replay logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference with compatibility for older browsers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, permissions, admin checks, and various backend interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Empty placeholder file for queued mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns a stable set of random quotes per route, regenerating on navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Tracks and stores recently viewed products with expiration and max-length handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchArtifacts.ts: Search hook returning placeholder empty results until backend search is implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: React hook that persists component state to localStorage with a session ID and expiry.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for health checks, logs, and system events.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based themes, fonts, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccessCode.ts: Utilities for normalizing and validating admin access code format on the client.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccessSession.ts: Manages session-scoped admin access state using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/adminEntryLockout.ts: Handles persistent admin lockout flags per principal using versioned localStorage entries.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Lightweight analytics supporting backend logging or Google Analytics with page and event tracking.
frontend/src/lib/authorizationErrors.ts: Maps backend authorization errors to user-friendly messages and identifies auth errors.
frontend/src/lib/clientDetails.ts: Collects browser user agent info and derives device type for logging and security.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Local error log storage with sanitization, size limits, and basic route capture.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Centralized localStorage wrapper providing versioning, expiry, safe read/write, and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Implements a localStorage-backed queue for offline mutations with functions to add, update, and remove queued items.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Provides a helper to randomly select 2–3 non-repeating quotes from a predefined list.
frontend/src/lib/routePaths.ts: Defines centralized route path constants and a union type for valid routes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with an intro and creator biography using styled layout and animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Provides the admin dashboard with section navigation, access-granted messaging, and gated access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAccess.tsx: Handles admin access code submission, lockout logic, and redirects on successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Owner-only Admin+ panel with advanced tools for analytics, shop controls, coupon management, admin registry, and password resets.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Displays a lore-themed blog listing with categories, metadata, and intro section.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact page with a form, intro section, and FAQ, including simulated form submission and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays a user dashboard with profile greeting and a placeholder for future order data.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Shows a searchable FAQ page with categorized questions, intro section, and accordion UI.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, featured carousel, quick links, and promotional sections.
frontend/src/pages/Inbox.tsx: Provides an inbox page layout with a placeholder for future message functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Displays a portfolio page with category filters and placeholders for portfolio items.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Contains the privacy policy page with structured sections outlining data practices and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/SearchArtifacts.tsx: Implements a searchable and filterable artifact results page with query controls and result rendering hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays an extensive services overview with themed sections describing available custom and magical item offerings.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Provides a shop interface with search, view toggles, and an empty-state notice indicating products are not yet available.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitRequest.tsx: Shows a placeholder custom request form noting backend support is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Renders the Terms of Service page with multiple sections outlining usage, liability, and policies.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Displays testimony introduction and a placeholder card indicating the feature awaits backend implementation.
frontend/src/types/adminMessaging.ts: Empty file reserved for future admin messaging type definitions.
frontend/src/types/common.ts: Defines common product-related types including visibility, availability, and product structure.
frontend/src/types/orderTracking.ts: Provides order tracking types, labels, helper functions, and structures for status history and fulfillment info.
frontend/src/types/phase5a.ts: Defines request and testimony types for Phase 5A, including media structures and pricing preferences.
frontend/src/types/phase5b.ts: Defines Phase 5B request, inbox, and attachment TypeScript interfaces and tagged union types.
frontend/src/utils/mediaValidation.ts: Provides file, description, and video validation utilities plus helper functions for formatting and type checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project state, scope notes, existing features, and new feature requests for navigation, shop, and admin updates.
